CustomField.description: Link to the Item Class that contains Items that are either required or optional for selection as part of a sale of the Package Item. The requirement for selection of the Item related to the Item Class is controlled by the "Is Optional" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Link to the Item Class that contains Items that are either required or optional for selection as part of a sale of the Package Item. The requirement for selection of the Item related to the Item Class is controlled by the "Is Optional" field.
CustomField.label: Item Class
